template.subject: Request: French Parliamentary Action on Iran Crisis
template.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am writing to request urgent action by the French Parliament regarding the human rights crisis in Iran.

Since 28 December 2025:
â€¢ Over 51 peaceful protesters have been killed by Iranian security forces
â€¢ More than 2,270 people have been arbitrarily detained
â€¢ A nationwide internet blackout has been imposed
â€¢ Documented use of live ammunition against civilians

As a permanent member of the UN Security Council and founding member of the European Union, France has unique influence on the international stage. I respectfully request that Parliament:

1. Hold hearings on the human rights situation in Iran
2. Support EU-wide sanctions against officials responsible for abuses
3. Raise the issue at the UN Security Council
4. Call for the immediate release of detained protesters
5. Coordinate with international partners on a unified response

France has historically championed human rights and liberty. I urge you to uphold these values now.

With respect,
A concerned citizen from {{senderCountry}}
